Constructors in sagma.core.math with parameters of type Vec2
Vec2(Vec2 v)
          
Constructs a new 2D vector by doing a deep copy of another vector
The new vector exists independently of the other vector

          Constructs a new 3D Vector by first adding a component and then wrapping a 2D vector

          Wraps a 2D vector into a 3D one.
